original: Eliasson, Erik Alarik Vallentin, folkskollärare, stadsbibliotekarie, Vetlanda, f. 2/9/88 i Varberg av Elof E. o. Beata Sofia Eliasson. G. 17 m. Signe Danielsson. Barn: Gunborg f. 14 (i fru E. tid. äkt.), Britt 18, Majken 20, Ingemar 31. — Realex. i Var-berg 07, folksk :ilär :ex. i Växjö 14. Lär. i Vetlanda ’sed. 14, ord. lär. där sed. 15, stadsbibi. sed. 15. Medarb. i Ostgöta Correspondenten sed. 26. Skolbibl. sed. 27, led. av barnav:ndn sed. 30 år, ordf. där sed. 40, ordf. i ungd :ndn sed. 40, v. ordf. i socialv:ndn sed. 39, led. av ny^kterh:ndn sed. 39, fam:bidr:-ndn sed. 40 o. hemhjälpsndn sed. 44, lär .’kårens repr. i folksk :styr. sed. 44.
translated: Eliasson, Erik Alarik Vallentin, elementary school teacher, city librarian, Vetlanda, b. 2/9/88 in Varberg to parents Elof E. and Beata Sofia Eliasson. Married on the 17th with Signe Danielsson. Children: Gunborg b. 14 (from Mrs. E.'s previous marriage), Britt b. 18, Majken b. 20, Ingemar b. 31. Graduated from Varberg Real School in 1907, received teaching degree in Växjö in 1914. Became a teacher in Vetlanda in 1914, permanent teacher there since 1915, city librarian since 1915. Contributed to Ostgöta Correspondenten since 1926, school library since 1927, child welfare committee member since 1930; chairman since 1940, youth committee chairman since 1940, deputy chairman of social welfare committee since 1939, member of temperance committee since 1939, family support committee member since 1940 and home aid committee member since 1944. Represented the teaching corps in the elementary school board since 1944.
